title: Bend Over For My Family
description: Pretty Gina Wesley is locked in the passionate embrace of her boyfriend's brother, when their father suddenly returns. Terrified of this mysterious billionaire, Gina scuttles to dress up for him.But when Russell Devlin, the patriarch of the house, offers her a contract for her sexual servitude, Gina must decide if she will sell her body to her new 'Daddy' - who can be a very stern and demanding master.This 9800 word BDSM novelette is Volume 2 of the 'Initiation 2' series. The 'Initiation' series has sold well over 120,000 copies.
author: Aphrodite Hunt
